name: The 7th World Conference on Education and Teaching
content: The learning opportunities at ETCONF 2025 are exceptional. Attendees will benefit from access to insightful research, stimulating discussions, and a variety of educational formats. Additionally, this event is a prime opportunity to network with peers, explore new research avenues, find inspiration, advance your career, and experience the host city’s culture. The three-day conference will equip you with valuable knowledge and inspiration to propel your work forward for months. Each presentation will feature a Q&A session, fostering in-depth discussions, insights into research specifics, and new application strategies. Additionally, participants are invited to a complimentary one-day guided tour of the host city, presenting a chance to explore the city’s architecture and culture while networking informally. Accepted abstracts will be published in the Conference Abstract Book (with ISBN), and full papers may be published in indexed international journals like SCOPUS, Web of Science, and DOAJ, or as a book chapter. Participants will also receive a certificate of participation.
